name: Hullamatou Ceesay
blurb: Most of America's hungry are native-born, but new immigrants like Hullamatou Ceesay from Gambia struggle too, taking meals wherever they can find them.

name: Kristin Hahn
blurb: Kristin Hahn and her grandmother, Janet Groven, visit a weekly soup kitchen in Charles City, Iowa. 'By the end of the month we have nothing.'
